name: Fresh Red Apple
description: Crisp, sweet, and juicy red apples sourced directly from Himalayan orchards. Perfect for a healthy snack or fresh apple pie.

name: Organic Broccoli
description: Premium organic broccoli heads, rich in vitamins and perfect for steaming, stir-fries, or healthy salads.

name: Fresh Milk 1L
description: Pure, farm-fresh whole milk with no added preservatives. Rich in calcium and protein for your daily nutrition.

name: Juicy Orange
description: Sun-ripened juicy oranges packed with Vitamin C. Great for fresh juice or a refreshing zesty snack.

name: Organic Bananas
description: Naturally sweet and energy-boosting organic bananas. Grown without pesticides and handled with care.

name: Red Strawberries
description: Sweet, juicy, and vibrant red strawberries. Perfect for desserts, smoothies, or enjoying fresh out of the punnet.

name: Fresh Tomatoes
description: Ripe, firm, and tangy fresh tomatoes. Essential for curries, salads, sauces, and sandwiches.

name: Green Bell Pepper
description: Crunchy and fresh green bell peppers. Adds a perfect zest and crunch to your pizzas, pastas, and stir-fries.

name: Organic Carrots
description: Sweet and crunchy organic carrots, grown without harmful chemicals. A great source of Vitamin A and perfect for snacking.

name: Farm Fresh Eggs
description: High-quality farm-fresh eggs with rich golden yolks. Packed with protein and essential nutrients for a healthy breakfast.

name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: Soft and wholesome whole wheat bread, baked fresh daily. High in fiber and perfect for making healthy sandwiches.

name: Cheddar Cheese
description: Aged cheddar cheese with a sharp, rich flavor. Excellent for melting on toast, burgers, or grating over pasta.

name: Fresh Potatoes
description: Versatile fresh potatoes, perfect for mashing, frying, or baking. A kitchen staple for delicious homemade meals.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice with no added sugar. Bursting with natural citrus flavor and Vitamin C.

name: Strawberry Juice
description: Sweet and refreshing strawberry juice. Made from real berries for an authentic and delightful fruity taste.

name: Apple Juice
description: Clarified apple juice with a crisp and clean taste. A favorite refreshing beverage for kids and adults alike.

name: Citrus Juice
description: Zesty citrus juice blend of lemon and lime. The perfect base for cocktails, mocktails, or a tangy lemonade.

name: Watermelon Juice
description: Hydrating watermelon juice, perfect for beating the summer heat. Naturally sweet and incredibly refreshing.

name: Fresh Spinach
description: Tender and nutrient-dense fresh spinach leaves. Ideal for salads, cooking, or adding to green smoothies.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt, packed with probiotics and protein. A perfect healthy breakfast or snack option.

name: Sourdough Bread
description: Artisanal sourdough bread with a crispy crust and chewy texture. Fermented to perfection for a distinct tangy flavor.

name: Fresh Salmon
description: Premium fresh salmon fillets, rich in Omega-3 fatty acids. Delicious whether grilled, baked, or pan-seared.

name: Chicken Breast
description: Lean and tender chicken breast cuts. High in protein and versatile for various recipes, from curries to salads.

name: Green Grapes
description: Sweet and seedless green grapes. A refreshing and healthy snack for any time of the day.

name: Tofu Block
description: Firm silken tofu block, an excellent plant-based protein source. Absorbs flavors well, making it great for curries and stir-fries.

name: Vanilla Bean Tub
description: Creamy and rich vanilla bean ice cream. Made with real vanilla pods for a luxurious classic dessert.

name: Chocolate Fudge Cone
description: Indulgent chocolate fudge cone, filled with rich chocolate ice cream and topped with crunchy nuts.

name: Strawberry Scoop
description: Sweet strawberry ice cream scoop made with real fruit puree. A delightful pink treat for berry lovers.

name: Soft Baby Diapers
description: Soft, absorbent, and rash-free baby diapers. Designed for maximum comfort and leak protection for your little one.

name: Organic Baby Puree
description: Organic and preservative-free baby puree. A nutritious and easy-to-digest meal option for infants.

name: Gentle Baby Wipes
description: Gentle and alcohol-free baby wipes. Infused with aloe vera to clean and soothe your baby's delicate skin.

name: Premium Dog Food
description: Balanced and nutritious premium dog food. Formulated to support energy, coat health, and digestion for your furry friend.

name: Tuna Cat Feast
description: Gourmet tuna feast for cats. Rich in protein and essential taurine to keep your feline happy and healthy.

name: Chewy Dog Treats
description: Delicious chewy treats for dogs. Great for training or as a special reward to keep tails wagging.

name: Classic Potato Chips
description: Classic salted potato chips, crispy and addictive. The ultimate party snack or side for your sandwich.

name: Salted Popcorn
description: Light and fluffy salted popcorn. The perfect companion for your movie nights and binge-watching sessions.

name: Choco Chip Cookies
description: Crunchy chocolate chip cookies baked to perfection. Loaded with chocolate chunks for a sweet delight.

name: Roasted Mixed Nuts
description: A mix of premium roasted nuts including almonds, cashews, and hazelnuts. A powerhouse of energy and nutrition.

name: Fresh Mutton Curry Cut
description: Tender and flavorful free-range mutton, expertly cut for curries. Perfect for slow-cooking to achieve a melt-in-the-mouth texture.

name: Smoked Pork Ribs
description: Succulent pork ribs with a smoky flavor. Ideal for barbecuing or roasting to perfection for a delicious family dinner.

name: Beef Steak Cuts
description: Premium quality beef steak cuts, rich in flavor and tenderness. Best served grilled with your favorite sides.

name: Classic Cheese Burger
description: Juicy grilled beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, and tomatoes. Served on a toasted sesame bun.

name: Spicy Chicken Wrap
description: Crispy fried chicken strips wrapped in a soft tortilla with spicy mayo, crunchy lettuce, and pickles.

name: Loaded Cheesy Fries
description: Golden crispy fries smothered in rich cheese sauce, bacon bits, and jalapenos. The ultimate comfort food.

name: Jumbo Prawns
description: Large, succulent jumbo prawns, cleaned and deveined. Perfect for grilling, curries, or a classic garlic butter stir-fry.

name: Fresh Blue Crab
description: Freshly caught blue crabs with sweet and tender meat. Excellent for crab cakes, bisques, or spicy crab curry.

name: Lobster Tail
description: Premium cold-water lobster tails with rich, firm meat. The ultimate indulgence for a special gourmet dinner at home.
